posts.title: Centos搭建我的世界PE服务器
posts.text: 第一步，切换到root用并安装wget和screen软件包，然后进入screen环境中123sudo suapt install wget screen -yscreen 第二步：创建/data/mcpe文件夹，下载服务端执行文件并给予可执行权限。1234mkdir /data/mcpecd /data/mcpewget https://cuncu-1252309123.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/mcpeserverchmod +x mcpeserver 第三步：下载x86版我的世界安装包（只适用于服务端）1wget -O minecraft.apk https://cuncu-1252309123.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/mc1.5.2x86.apk 第四步：补全文件并解压安装包wget https://cuncu-1252309123.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/bin.tar.gztar -zxvf bin.tar.gz./mcpeserver unpack 1### 第五步：运行 ./mcpeserver run``` 出现 ‘I [Bridge] Server initialized’ 说明服务器启动成功 输入 ‘:quit’或者按Ctrl+C关闭服务端，然后编辑对应文件，这些文件一眼就能看出哪个是哪个，不需要我多说此时你就可以去游戏客户端内添加个服务器了，IP，端口19132

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
